message.raw:
Fixed bug where supposedly immutable components were mutable

ComponentTypeInfo now has two copies: shallow and deep
Shallow byte copies the component to a new location
Deep uses the copy constructor and placement new operator to copy the component
The database uses these methods as appropriate
